content:
aside: Is this the right place to ask questions about basic-webserver? Thought I might ask here before trying to file an issue over on GitHub.

I'm noticing that MultipartFormData.parse_form_url_encoded, when there's a field value with a space in it, does not replace the + in the URL encoded string with a space, so when I submit a value "with spaces" I get back "with+spaces"
Sounds like a bug. You can make an issue in basic-webserver repo... I am currently focussed on other priorities but someone may get a chance to look at it.
